title: Hire a Freelance Video Editor
description: A production needs to hire a freelance video editor for a short-term project.

tasks.description: Search a database of pre-approved freelancers for video editors with experience in the relevant genre.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds five suitable freelance editors.

tasks.description: Check the availability of the shortlisted editors for the project dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms two of the five editors are available.

tasks.description: Send a contract offer to the selected editor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates and sends a standard freelance contract.
